fields.summary: CLI: Developer names with Chinese characters appear as octal escape sequence in Titanium Info

fields.description:
When we scrape the output of the "security dump-keychain" command, the CLI doesn't properly decode the certificate name.

Here's a Q&A question that describes this problem: http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/145926/issues-with-ti-30-studio--30-sdk#answer-253804
fields.summary: CLI: iOS certificate names with unicode characters are not properly decoded
